Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ESF17 (Synthetic AMPs, ESF1 deletion analog 2, Ala-rich; UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, AMPHIBIAN, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (94.44%) toESF12A: 41%, L=R: 24%.Activity: Active against fungi C. parasitica (MIC 100 uM), F.oxysporum (MIC 250 uM), and S.musiva (MIC 250 uM). Marginally active.
Literature Information.Author: Powell WA, Catranis CM, Maynard CA. 1995
Literature Information.Reference: Mol Plant Microbe Interact. 1995 Sep-Oct;8(5):792-4. doi: 10.1094/mpmi-8-0792.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Synthetic antimicrobial peptide design
